info.name: Pratilipi-Microservices-Backend
info.description: ## Docs to help user interact with the API for Pratilipi backend microservices task

item.name: Content Service

request.description:
## Request to Create Content

### Required Fields
* title: String
* story: String

## Request to Fetch Content details

### Required Fields
* filter: Object 
  filter object takes in the filters for Content documents to fetch

  filter object can have either of the following set of fields
  >* _id: String | Optional

  OR

  >* first_name: String | Optional
  >* last_name: String | Optional
  >* email: String | Optional
  >* phone: Number | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty filter object indicates to fetch all the Content documents**

## Request to Update Content

### Required Fields
* filter: Object 
  filter object takes in the filters for Content documents to update

  filter object can have either of the following set of fields
  >* _id: String | Optional

  OR

  >* title: String | Optional
  >* story: String | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty filter object indicates to update all the Content documents**

* update: Object
  update object takes in the updates to be made to the Content documents filtered

  update object can have the following fields
  >* title: String | Optional
  >* story: String | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty update object indicates to update nothing in the filtered Content documents**

## Request to Delete Content

### Required Fields
* filter: Object 
  filter object takes in the filters for Content documents to delete

  filter object can have either of the following set of fields
  >* _id: String | Optional

  OR

  >* first_name: String | Optional
  >* last_name: String | Optional
  >* email: String | Optional
  >* phone: Number | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty filter object indicates to delete all the Content documents**

## Request to Fetch New Content

### Fields
* total: Number | Optional

**NOTE: If total is not provided by default a maximum of 10 documents are fetched provided 10 Content documents exist in the collection**

## Request to Fetch Top Content

### Fields
* total: Number | Optional

**NOTE: If total is not provided by default a maximum of 10 documents are fetched provided 10 Content documents exist in the collection**

item.description: ###### API endpoints to help users interact with the Content Service

item.name: User Service

request.description:
## Request to Create User

### Required Fields
* first_name: String
* last_name: String
* email: String
* phone: Number

## Request to Update User

### Required Fields
* filter: Object 
  filter object takes in the filters for User documents to update

  filter object can have either of the following set of fields
  >* _id: String | Optional

  OR

  >* first_name: String | Optional
  >* last_name: String | Optional
  >* email: String | Optional
  >* phone: Number | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty filter object indicates to update all the User documents**

* update: Object
  update object takes in the updates to be made to the User documents filtered

  update object can have the following fields
  >* first_name: String | Optional
  >* last_name: String | Optional
  >* email: String | Optional
  >* phone: Number | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty update object indicates to update nothing in the filtered User documents**

## Request to Fetch User details

### Required Fields
* filter: Object 
  filter object takes in the filters for User documents to update

  filter object can have either of the following set of fields
  >* _id: String | Optional

  OR

  >* first_name: String | Optional
  >* last_name: String | Optional
  >* email: String | Optional
  >* phone: Number | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty filter object indicates to fetch all the User documents**

## Request to Delete

### Required Fields
* filter: Object 
  filter object takes in the filters for User documents to delete

  filter object can have either of the following set of fields
  >* _id: String | Optional

  OR

  >* first_name: String | Optional
  >* last_name: String | Optional
  >* email: String | Optional
  >* phone: Number | Optional

  **NOTE: Empty filter object indicates to delete all the User documents**

item.description: ###### API endpoints to help users interact with the User Service

item.name: Interaction Service

request.description:
## Request to Like Content Interaction

### Required Fields
* content_id: String
* user_id: String

**NOTE: content_id and user_id must be valid id of a previously existing Content document and User document respectively**

## Request to Unlike Content Interaction

### Required Fields
* content_id: String
* user_id: String

**NOTE: content_id and user_id must be valid id of a previously existing Content document and User document respectively**

## Request to handle Read Content Ineraction

### Required Fields
* content_id: String
* user_id: String

**NOTE: content_id and user_id must be valid id of a previously existing Content document and User document respectively**

item.description: ###### API endpoints to help users interact with the User Interaction Service
